thread.title: BRIEF-ENGlobal Engages B. Riley FBR For Review Of Strategic Alternatives To Increase Shareholder Value

title: BRIEF-ENGlobal Engages B. Riley FBR For Review Of Strategic Alternatives To Increase Shareholder Value

organizations.name: increase shareholder value reuters staff    englobal corp

text:
April 18, 2018 / 1:10 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-ENGlobal Engages B. Riley FBR For Review Of Strategic Alternatives To Increase Shareholder Value Reuters Staff 
  ENGlobal Corp: 
* ENGLOBAL ENGAGES B. RILEY FBR FOR REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES TO INCREASE SHAREHOLDER VALUE 
* ENGLOBAL CORP - HAS INITIATED A REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES 
* ENGLOBAL CORP - ALTERNATIVES COULD INCLUDE STRATEGIC MERGERS, REVERSE MERGERS, ISSUANCE OR BUYBACK OF PUBLIC SHARES 
* ENGLOBAL CORP - ALTERNATIVES COULD ALSO INCLUDE PURCHASE OR SALE OF SPECIFIC ASSETS
